TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeViewImageIndexConverter extends System.Windows.Forms.ImageIndexConverter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter) 將影像索引資料的某個型別與其他資料型別相互轉換，方法是使用 控制項。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert data for an image index to and from one data type to another for use by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需型別轉換子的詳細資訊，請參閱基底類別和[如何： 實作型別轉換子](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120))。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2013/ayybcxe5(v=vs.120)). > [!NOTE] > 一般而言，您無法直接建立的執行個體。Typically, you do not directly create an instance of a . 請改為呼叫方法的。Instead, call the method of . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例基底類別。For more information, see the examples in the base class.
